name: cat
info: Very abundant in captivity, true wildcats less abundant though not rare. Feral populations very common.

name: pig
info: Common in the wild. Much more common in captivity. Feral animals common in some areas.

name: sheep
info: Common in captivity, threatened in the wild

name: goat
info: Common in captivity, threatened in wild, feral goats common

name: dog
info: Domestic and feral dogs both very common,[6] ancestor or nearest wild relative less common but not rare

name: chicken
info: Very common in captivity and the wild

name: cow
info: Very common in captivity, wild relatives extinct, feral cattle fairly common

name: horse
info: Common in captivity, very rare in wild, feral populations common

name: buffalo
info: Somewhat rare in captivity, endangered in the wild

name: ferret
info: Common in captivity, somewhat common in the wild. Feral ferrets rare

name: Llama
info: Fairly common in captivity and the wild

name: Yak
info: Fairly common in captivity; threatened in the wild.
